title: Lag when dying
body: Before anyone accuses me of dying not of lag because I'm bad that's not the case. Recently I've been getting massive FPS drops whenever I near or do die, I play with FPS and ping showing so I know this is happening

replies.body: There could be some bad game files having issues rendering when your champ dies.  Try out the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune things up.  You can also download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) for a quick repair.  I hope that helps!
